Desc.entry: Part of Sheffield Libraries, Archives and Information. Stock and facilities include: A3 and A4 photocopier, newspapers, videos, DVDs, CDs, language tapes and talking books. The library has a meeting room available for hire and a learning/homework centre. Activities include Baby Time, Story Time, holiday craft activities for primary school age children and councillors' surgeries. An Agewell group (see separate entry) meets weekly and an Agewell Friendship Circle (see separate entry) meets alternate Friday afternoons. Provides 14 People's Network computers with Microsoft Office and internet access, and a scanner for public use.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon 9.30am-7pm, Tues, Wed & Fri 9.15am-5.30pm, Thurs closed, Sat 9.15am-4pm (opening times); 2nd & 4th Mon in the month 2-2.45pm (Under 5s, term-time only), Tues 2-4pm (Agewell group), alternate Fri 1.30-3.30pm (Agewell Friendship Circle), 3rd Fri in the month 10-11am (Baby Time), Sat 10.30-11.30am (Councillor's Surgery), Sat am (MP's Surgery, by appointment)
